unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Season is ON!**
normalised: entertainment buzz film fest season is on

unnormalised: Hey folks, movie buffs rejoice! Festival season is kicking off with a bang. We're talking everything from the biggies like the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival making a comeback after some hiccups, to smaller, independent gems popping up in places like Pune and Kochi.
normalised: hey folks movie buffs rejoice festival season is kicking off with a bang we are talking everything from the biggies like the Jio M A M I Mumbai Film Festival making a comeback after some hiccups to smaller independent gems popping up in places like Pune and Kochi

unnormalised: Word on the street is that this year's line-up is seriously impressive. Expect to see everything from Bollywood blockbusters to indie films exploring themes close to home.
normalised: word on the street is that this year is line-up is seriously impressive expect to see everything from Bollywood blockbusters to indie films exploring themes close to home

unnormalised: And guess what? The International Film Festival of Kerala is expected to be bigger than ever, with screenings scheduled across Thiruvananthapuram. Perfect excuse to enjoy some delicious Onam Sadhya afterwards, right?
normalised: and guess what the International Film Festival of Kerala is expected to be bigger than ever with screenings scheduled across Thiruvananthapuram perfect excuse to enjoy some delicious Onam Sadhya afterwards right

unnormalised: There are rumors swirling about a special focus on regional cinema this year, with Kannada and Marathi films taking center stage. So keep your eyes peeled for some real hidden gems. Don't forget to check your local listings and grab those early bird tickets! Let the cinematic adventures begin! It is going to be a rollercoaster ride. Tickets starting from Rs. 500, so get yours soon!
